donate.label: ‚òï  ‚òï  Buy the dev a coffee  ‚òï  ‚òï
donate.tooltip: Keep the development of free scripts going buying the developer a coffee!

contact.label: Want a custom script? Contact me!
contact.tooltip: Click here to contact the script's developer luissanchezdev

open_readme.label: View readme
open_readme.tooltip: Click here to view the script's documentation.

read_all_text.label: Read ALL chat
read_all_text.tooltip:
Check this to read all chat disregarding the command.
IF YOU ARE USING THIS FEATURE MAKE SURE TO SET A FAST SPEED SO THE CHATBOT CAN KEEP UP!

command.label: Command
command.tooltip: Command for users to say something with TTS.

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

msg_permission.value: You don't have enough permissions to use this command.
msg_permission.label: Permissions
msg_permission.tooltip: Message shown when someone tries to issue the command without enough permissions.

msg_cooldown.value: This command is still on cooldown!
msg_cooldown.label: Cooldown
msg_cooldown.tooltip: Message shown when someone tries to issue the command but it is still on cooldown.

msg_user_cooldown.value: You need to wait before using this command again.
msg_user_cooldown.label: User Cooldown
msg_user_cooldown.tooltip: Message shown when someone tries to issue the command while they are on cooldown.

msg_cost.value: You don't have enough money to use this command.
msg_cost.label: Cost
msg_cost.tooltip: Message shown when someone tries to issue the command without enough points.

cmd_ban.label: Add user to blacklist command
cmd_ban.tooltip: Use this command to add an user to the blacklist

cmd_unban.label: Remove user from blacklist command
cmd_unban.tooltip: Use this command to remove an user from the blacklist

blacklist_permission.label: Blacklist permission
blacklist_permission.tooltip: Allow these users to blacklist/unblacklist people

length.label: Max length (seconds)
length.tooltip: Limit the duration the TTS will be speaking.

clear_queue.label: üóëÔ∏è Clear TTS queue üóëÔ∏è
clear_queue.tooltip: Clean the queue if a lot of texts are waiting to be spoken.
